description:
The Le Figaro.fr app on your HP TouchPad : live the news on mobile.

Complete and completely customizable, discover the new application le figaro.fr:

> Complete:
With a new experience of navigation, find all the sections of Le Figaro.fr : news, auto, sport, international, economy, stock exchange, video shows… 27 sections including up to 40 articles.
The Flash of three themes (News, Economy, Sport), will allow you to follow the real time news.

> Customizable:
Prioritize the sections)and the types of alerts of your choice.
Use the search engine of the application to find all the articles or relative subjects by keyword.
Share your articles by email, on Facebook and on Twitter.

> Fast:
The side scrolling allows you to navigate very easy within 4 universes.

> Playful:
In portrait or landscape mode, view the video shows.
